overview: Zerodha is India's largest retail stockbroker, offering discount brokerage services with zero commission on equity delivery trades. We provide trading platforms, investment tools, and educational resources for retail and institutional investors.

products.name: Kite
products.description: Fast and elegant trading platform for web and mobile. Trade stocks, F&O, commodities, and currencies with advanced charting and order types.

products.name: Coin
products.description: Direct mutual fund investment platform with zero commission. Invest in 3000+ mutual funds directly without any distributor markup.

products.name: Console
products.description: Comprehensive back-office for managing your trading account, viewing reports, P&L statements, and tax documents.

products.name: Kite Connect
products.description: Trading APIs for developers and algo traders. Build trading apps, integrate with your systems, or run algorithmic strategies.

products.name: Varsity
products.description: Free educational resource with comprehensive modules on trading, investing, and financial markets.
